author: patrickl
msg: Refactoring to remove unnecessary code and simplify the logging of errors
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_04'.

author: patrickl
msg: Add support for <jvmargset> and <argset> data types to match the existing <syspropertyset> data type. Also, fixed bug where the properties in nested elements would not get resolved properly if the property is set in a line after the nested element in the XML file.

author: patrickl
msg: Replace all Vectors with ArrayLists and Hashtables with HashMaps since only Java 1.2 or higher is supported

author: patrickl
msg: Load supported Ant tasks directly instead of using the Project.init() method. This reduces the number of classes load and cuts down the time it takes the Launcher to execute the launch-ant.sh script by about 0.5 - 1.0 seconds depending on the verson of Ant.
